body:
Using `newSlice := fileIn` you create a new slice header, but both share the same backing array.
So when you change the value in the backing array of `newSlice`, it does change the value in `fileIn` too.

This blog post can help you: http://blog.golang.org/go-slices-usage-and-internals
Btw, for such question it's better to use [the mailling list](http://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/golang-nuts)
